CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(CallDurationInSeconds),null,
IF((MOD((CallDurationInSeconds)/60,1)*60) > 10,
TEXT(FLOOR( (CallDurationInSeconds)/60)) + " Min: " + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((CallDurationInSeconds)/60,1)*60) ) + " Sec",
TEXT(FLOOR( (CallDurationInSeconds)/60)) + " Min: 0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((CallDurationInSeconds)/60,1)*60) ) + " Sec"
))
CustomField.label: Call Duration
